documents.document:
KASHMIR TOUR

Kashmir is the place that is showered by marvelous natural beauty. Kashmir is well known as the Paradise on Earth and is remarkably beautiful that no human tongue can interpret its magical beauty, charm and magnificence. Kashmir Tour makes its best to bring for you the natural beauty, snow capped mountains, verdant woods, lush green surrounding, musical waterfalls, scenic lakes and interesting places of tourist interest in Kashmir. Kashmir is one of the most sought after holiday destinations in India. One can experience a wide happiness of haven on earth by enjoying Kashmir tour. On the other hand Kashmir Tour also provides several adventure sports and activities like white-water rafting; snow skiing, water skiing, camping, surfing, rock climbing, para-gliding, jeep safari and many alike.

KATHMANDU TOUR

Kathmandu Tour brings for you one of the most sought after tourist attractions of Nepal tourism and that is none other than the pictorial Kathmandu Valley. Kathmandu Tour provides you a brilliant opportunity to explore cultural and geographical richness of this country. Kathmandu is the place where one can see the beautiful temples, old palaces, and interesting old quarters. Perched on a hillock, the Swaymbhunath Temple is a well-known Buddhist monument in the city. The prime tourist attractions that the Kathmandu Tour consists of in the itineraries include Kathmandu Durbar Square, Swaymbhunath Stupa (Monkey Temple), Boudhanath Stupa and Pashupati Temple.

KHAJURAHO TOUR

Khajuraho is the popular tourist destination to visit in India. Khajuraho is also known as the Land of God Moon. Khajuraho comes among the UNESCO World Heritage Sites. Khajuraho is the favorite tourist’s destination for all the visitors across the globe. Khajuraho tour packages consist of tailor-made itineraries that can be redesigned as per the client’s choice. Khajuraho Tour also presents tour to one of the favorite tourist’s places that are Orchha, Bhojpur and Chanderi. Khajuraho is also famous for it’s magnificent temples, some of the popular temples are Chitagupt temple, Vishwanath temple, Devi Jagadhamba temple, Ghantai temple, Adinath temple, Chaturbhuj temple and Duladeo temple included in Khajuraho Tour packages.

LADAKH TOUR

Ladakh is bounded by two of the world's mightiest mountain ranges, the Karakoram in the north and the Great Himalaya in the south; it is traversed by two other parallel chains, the Ladakh Range and the Zanskar Range. Ladakh Tour itineraries consist of world famous monasteries and monuments. The best places that the Ladakh Tour are; Dah-Hanou, Nubra Valley Pangong Lake and Tso Moriri Lake and so on. The adventure lovers can also choose adventure tour packages from our various Ladakh Tour packages. The Ladakh Tour package provides several adventure activities for instance, trekking, river rafting and mountaineering in Ladakh.

PILGRIM TOUR

A Pilgrim Tour in the heavenly land of India will surely bring all the faces of Indian devotions and one will be moved by seeing the unconditional faiths and beliefs of the Indians for the God. The diverse country, India is almost certainly the ultimate tourist destination of all kinds of pilgrims following any faith around the world. India is a diverse country and so as it’s diversity can be seen in the religions too. The great religions like Hinduism, Buddhism, Jainism, Islam, Christianity and Sikhism are the vital part of Indian culture and heritage whose values and faiths are mingled with the air, soil and the sky of India. Pilgrim Tour to India brings for you the holy feeling of Varanasi or Haridwar or taking a dip into the sacred Pushkar Lake or river Ganges washes away the sins and helps one to attain salvation. The divine Buddha pilgrimages, Bodhgaya and Sarnath are the destinations of thousands of Buddhist pilgrims every year coming from each and every corner of the earth.

PALACE ON WHEELS TOUR

Palace on Wheels Tour will let you taste the royalty of ancient India mainly the places of Rajasthan part. Palace on Wheels tour start from Delhi and continue it’s journey by covering all the royal destinations of Rajasthan. Palace on Wheels train is Rajasthan’s luxury train and the fourth best among the top ten luxury trains of the world by noted global travel magazine Conde Nast. The Palace on Wheels train was inspired by the Royal coaches, which belonged to the earlier rulers of the princely states. The Palace on Wheels Tour covers Delhi and halts at Jaipur, Chittaurgarh, Udaipur, Jaisalmer , Jodhpur, Bharatpur and Agra. The traveling is at night times and the touring is during the daytime. At every stop the passengers are taken for sight seeing of the place.

NEPAL TOUR

Nepal is a home to a rich cultural heritage and it offers an surprising diversity of sightseeing attractions and adventure opportunities found nowhere else on earth. Nepal is also highly praised for adventure tourism. The Nepal Tour offers numerous options for adventure tourism & activities. Mountaineering, rock climbing, hiking, trekking, mountain biking, camping, etc are popular adventure activities which can be enjoy on adventure Nepal tour in this country. The Nepal Tour also covers the famous wildlife sanctuaries that are Royal Chitwan National Park, Sagarmatha National Park, and Royal Bardia National Park. These national parks national parks in Nepal are known for diverse and rich flora and fauna. Nepal Tour also includes tours to Kathmandu, Lumbini, Pokhara, Nepalgunj, Patan, Bhaktapur and Janakpur.

LEH LADAKH TOUR

Leh Ladakh tourism is gaining high popularity from a couple of and Indian government is also promoting it so that the visitors can enjoy some incredible scenes and beauty of Leh Ladakh. Leh Ladakh tour itineraries comprises of various Buddhist monuments, monasteries and study centers. Leh Ladakh Tour is incomplete without the monasteries. Hemis, Thiksey , Lemayuru, Spitok Gompa and many more monasteries can be found here in Ladakh that actually reflects the Tibetan culture. The monasteries of Ladakh are also associated with Hindu religion and Hindu people offer prayers inside the temples build in the monastic complex. So the monasteries are not only limited to the beliefs of Buddhism only, it also holds strong place among the life of Hindu.

Ranthambore with Pushkar Tour

Ranthambore is the city of Tigers and one can enjoy the sacred town Pushkar too in our very special Ranthambore with Pushkar tour. Ranthambore National Park is opened for the visitors from 1st of October till 30th June every year. The travelers who want to enjoy some of the most fabulous tourist attractions of India, then they can plan a combined trip of Ranthambore with Pushkar Tour. The tour package Ranthambore with Pushkar Tour highlights the golden triangle tour places i.e. Delhi, Agra and Jaipur along with the visit to the Ranthambore National Park along with the Holy town of Rajasthan, Pushkar. Pushkar in real comes alive for a couple of weeks in October and November, when the Pushkar Camel Fair comes to town. It's a fascinating and peculiar sight, and a great opportunity to witness an old traditional style Indian festival.

South India Tour

Our selected South India Tour packages are a perfect option to discover the wonderful allures of South India. Tourists can easily cherish the exotic natural beauty and astonishing greenery of South India. Therefore you can get the breathtaking experience of tourism in India by discovering the real attractions of South India. South India Tour covers some of the popular tourist attractions in these states that are; Charminar Golkunda fort and Lord Balaji Temple in Tirupati, Kanchipuram, Chidambaram, Rameswaram, Kanyakumari, Ooty and Koidakanal in Tamilnadu and Hampi, Mysore and Bangalore in Karnataka. South India Tour is also popular for it’s beaches tour to that includes Kerala backwater destinations for instance Kumarakom, Kovalam, Alleppy and Kochi.

Forts and Palaces Tour of Rajasthan

Rajasthan is well popular for it’s great deserts and is also known as the land of Kings and Queens. The forts and palaces of Rajasthan to be seen on Forts and Palaces Tour of Rajasthan are the main attraction of a visit to this great land. In our exclusive tour packages of Forts and Palaces Tour of Rajasthan one can experience the splendid architecture of the forts that is worth seeing. Their superior structures are visible even from distant places in the cities where they are located. The land area covered by the fortification walls is often expansive and interesting in its own right, with incredible geological features and allowing breathtaking views of the surrounding area. Nowadays many of forts and palaces of Rajasthan have now been transformed into heritage hotels that offer tourists world class accommodation facilities with modern amenities, royal treatments, and traditional Indian hospitality.

TAJ MAHAL TOUR

Taj Mahal Tour includes the visit to the Taj Mahal that is no doubt, is the most precious architectural heritage of the wonder of India. Taj Mahal is situated on the bank of river Yamuna in Agra, Uttar Pradesh. Taj Mahal was built by the Mughal emperor Shah Jahan in the memory of his beloved wife, Mumtaz. Taj Mahal is open from sunrise to 19 hours. Taj Mahal visit is closed on every Fridays. Taj Mahal Tour makes a special visit to view the Taj Mahal during sunrise as it’s well worth the effort to get up early and spend sunrise there, as it majestically reveals itself. The Taj Mahal is also open for the visitors who are interested to have a sightseeing of Taj Mahal in nighttime. For moonlight viewing from 8.30 p.m. until 12.30 a.m., two days before and after each full moon.

WEST INDIA TOUR

West India Tour covers the most popular tourist destinations of West India Tourism namely Ahmedabad, Aurangabad, Ajanta caves and Ellora cave temples. The travelers can enjoy their precious vacations by exploring city life in Mumbai, the beaches of the rugged Konkan Coast, inland Maharashtra and the foothills of the Western Ghats. West India Tour itineraries covers the following places in the program that are; Ahmedabad, Alibaug, Amboli, Aurangabad, Bhandardara, Canacona, Daman, Goa, Karnala, Mahabaleshwar, Mumbai, Pune, Shirdi and so on. The worth seeing attractions in West India Tour are the caves of Ajanta and Ellora.

GOA TOUR

Rajasthan with Goa tour is a perfect example of showcasing the Indian diversity. Explore the historical inheritance and cultural heritage of Rajasthan along with luxurious beaches and electric nightlife parties of Goa with our exclusive package of Rajasthan with Goa Tour. Goa and Rajasthan are nowadays becoming highly demandable wedding destinations in India for urban tourists from the United States, a top tourism. Rajasthan with Goa Tour also conducts special wedding tours and honeymoon tours for Rajasthan as well as for Goa. Rajasthan with Goa Tour is a tailor-made tour package which gives tourists an opportunity to explore some of the most fascinating attractions of Rajasthan and Goa.

TRIBAL TOUR

The landscape of the state of Orissa is spotted with several places of tourist importance. The range of places includes magnificent temples, beaches, dense forests and wild life. Orissa boasts of a characteristic and wealthy cultural heritage. Tribal life describe by dance, music, rituals, hunting keeps on attracting tourists, historians and scholars like. Consonant with it's past, the state has distinguished itself as a wealthy source of natural resources, a unique place of handlooms and handicrafts and as a popular destination for students in history. Orissa is also referred to as the seat of Lord Jagannath at times. These temples represent the major part of the pilgrimage tourism in Orissa. Puri is the location of the famous Jagannath temple and one of the world`s most spectacular devotional processions, the Rath Yatra.

TRIP TO INDIA

Trip to India primarily takes you to the momentous places and destinations of India. Our Trip to India also provides the visitors the services of skilled guides, who will provide all the complete and detailed information on the places of visit. The travelers that are looking for Trip to India for them there are various places options that includes Delhi, Jaipur, Agra, Khajuraho and Varanasi. Trip to India makes you feel the experience of the greatness of Royals and Mughals. Some of the top monuments of India include Qutub Minar, India Gate, Red Fort, Jama Masjid, Lotus Temple in Delhi, Humayun tomb, Akbar's tomb, Itimad-Ud-Daulla, Taj Mahal and so on. A visit of the Ghats at Varanasi, where you may have boat excursion tour on the Holy river Ganges.

INDIA TOUR PACKAGES

The Tour India Packages covers the parts of the heritage cities of Rajasthan, Madhya Pradesh and Uttar Pradesh. Tour India Packages provides you those exciting surprises that include different attractions like the Taj Mahal, Ellora and Ajanta Caves, Red Fort, Amber Fort, Fatehpur Sikri, Khajuraho Temple, Varanasi and much more. There are numerous Ghats situated along with the river Ganges. You will also come across the famous university, Benaras Hindu university which is the largest residential university in Asia.

Khajuraho Tours

Khajuraho is well-known as the "Temple City of Central India". The temples of Khajuraho are well-known all over the world for its stylishly carved temples in pebbles. Some of well known temples are: Ghantai temple, Chitagupt temple, Chaturbhuj temple, Devi Jagadhamba temple, Vishwanath temple, Adinath temple and Duladeo temple.

Khajuraho Tour Package Cost Starts From: $149 per person for 3 nights & 4 days (twin sharing basis).

Day 01: Arrive Delhi
Day 02: Delhi - Khajuraho
Day 03: Khajuraho
Day 04: Khajuraho - Delhi - Departure

For more details please visit:
http://www.tourandtravelinindia.com/khajuraho-tours.aspx
Or mail us at: info@tourandtravelinindia.com

Andaman Nicobar Tour

For the honeymooners, for the adventure lovers and for the nature lovers, Andaman Nicobar is the best tour destination. Port Blair is the capital of Andaman Nicobar and these island is a Union Territory of India. Andaman Nicobar attractions is a combination of; Mount Harriet, Gandhi Park, Cellular Jail, Neil Island, Long Island, etc.

Andaman Nicobar Tour Package Cost Starts From: $369 per person for 09 nights & 10 days (twin sharing basis).

Day 01: Arrive at Port Blair
Day 02: Port Blair
Day 03: Havelock
Day 04: Havelock
Day 05: Havelock
Day 06: Havelock
Day 07: Havelock - Port Blair
Day 08: Port Blair
Day 09: Port Blair
Day 10: Port Blair - Departure

For more details please visit:
http://www.tourandtravelinindia.com/andaman-nicobar-tour.aspx
Or mail us at: info@tourandtravelinindia.com

Wildlife India Tours

The tourists who want to enjoy some of the most existing wildlife tourist attractions of India; wildlife India tours is the best options for those. Here is some of the wildlife sanctuaries in India are: Corbett National Park, Uttrakhand, Ranthambore National Park, Sawai madhopur, Bandhavgarh National Park, Madhya Pradesh, Periyar National Park, Kerala, Kaziranga National Park, Assam and Kanha National Park, Madhya Pradesh.

Wildlife India Tours Package Cost Starts From: $196 per person for 05 nights & 06 days (twin sharing basis).

Day 01: Arrival in Delhi
Day 02: Delhi - Jaipur
Day 03: Jaipur
Day 04: Jaipur - Ranthambore
Day 05: Ranthambore - Agra
Day 06: Agra - Delhi

For more details please visit:
http://www.tourandtravelinindia.com/wildlife-india-tours.aspx
Or mail us at: info@tourandtravelinindia.com

South India Tours

South India Tours consist of some most popular tourist destinations like; Chidambaram, Rameswaram, Kanyakumari, Ooty, Charminar Golkunda fort and Lord Balaji Temple in Tirupati, Kanchipuram, etc. South India tours offers: house boat, south india beaches, temples along with the ayurveda healing and with wide-ranging wildlife.

South India Tours Package Cost Starts From: $280 / person for 06 nights & 07 days (twin sharing basis).

Day 01: Cochin - Munnar
Day 02: Munnar
Day 03: Munnar - Thekkady (Periyar)
Day 04: Thekkady - Kumarakom
Day 05: Kumarakom - Kovalam
Day 06: Kovalam
Day 07: Kovalam - Trivandrum Airport

For more details please visit:
http://www.tourandtravelinindia.com/south-india-tours.aspx
Or mail us at: info@tourandtravelinindia.com

Rajasthan Desert Tour

Rajasthan tour consists of differences and varieties. For the most part cities to trip in Rajasthan are; Jaipur, Bikaner, Jaisalmer, Jodhpur, Udaipur, Mount Abu, Ajmer, Alwar, Bundi, Bharatpur, Mandawa, Pushkar and so on. Our every one of the tour packages for Rajasthan tour is such that will give you the exclusive experience of pure Rajasthan's art and culture.

Rajasthan Desert Tour Package Cost Starts From: $980 / person for 20 nights & 21 days (twin sharing basis).

Day 01: Delhi
Day 02: Delhi - Mandawa (225 km)
Day 03: Mandawa - Bikaner (200km)
Day 04: Bikaner - Jaisalmer (335km)
Day 05: Jaisalmer - Khuri (50 km)
Day 06: Khuri - Jaisalmer (50km)
Day 07: Jaisalmer - Jodhpur (333 km)
Day 08: Jodhpur - Mount-Abu (225km)
Day 09: Mount-Abu
Day 10: Mount-Abu - Ranakpur (185km)
Day 11: Ranakpur - Kumbhalgarh (50 km)
Day 12: Kumbhalgarh - Udaipur (100km)
Day 13: Udaipur
Day 14: Udaipur - Pushkar (200 km)
Day 15: Pushkar - Jaipur (145km)
Day 16: Jaipur
Day 17: Jaipur - Ranthambore (200 Km)
Day 18: Ranthambore
Day 19: Ranthambore - Agra (290Kms)
Day 20: Agra - Delhi (225km)
Day 21: Delhi - Departure

For more details please visit:
http://www.tourandtravelinindia.com/rajasthan-desert-tour.aspx
Or mail us at: info@tourandtravelinindia.com

Travel in india

Aviral Tours And Travels is one of the leading tour and travel providing company based in India. Our company is also well known as tour and travel in india as well as travel in india. We offering travel related services for domestic as well as abroad tourists. We cover each travel destinations such as Rajasthan, Delhi, Mumbai, Goa, South India, East India, West India, etc. We are dedicated to offer travel businesses in India such as hotels booking, tour packages, flight booking, taxi or cab booking at the same travel portal. Our travel in India team with skilled as well as experienced tourist guides; are dedicated to provide the complete and huge information on the places they are visiting.
Our Adventure travel tour package india cost starts at just $ 69 each person that covers water fall adventure, hills, trekking, rafting, Rock Climbing / Rappelling, most exciting rapids on the Ganga, riverbank life along the Ganga, etc.

India Tour

India Tour offers the major destinations of the India are Rajasthan, Madhya Pradesh and Uttar Pradesh, Goa, Delhi, South India, etc with their heritage and cultural history and tour orientations. India Tour is dedicated to provide you exciting tour packages that include different attractions such as Red Fort, Amber Fort, Fatehpur Sikri, Taj Mahal, Ellora and Ajanta Caves, Khajuraho Temple, Varanasi, camel safari, Goa beaches, Kerala house boat and much more.
India tour magnetizes thousands of foreign tourists that come each year from all over the countries and from different parts from world. India is a dissimilar country due to it’s different culture, different languages, different religion, etc. India tour consists of visit to the historical monuments and palaces, the fascinating beaches, the well known world-wide temples, the glorious hills stations, resorts and many more places of worth seeing during India tour packages. India tour concentrates on every region’s folk dances, handicrafts, dance and music, fairs and festivals, etc.
Our Beach India tour package cost starts at just $ 63 each person that covers Goa beaches, temple visit, site seeing, church visit and more exciting adventures.
